As the ship flew on th=
ere was a small tone the beeped once indicating
that communications had bee=
n cut off. They were on their own now,
trying to find TUSCON and hopefully =
be close enough should he run into
more trouble than they could handle. Aft=
er all if there was something
out there that could bring down both CYCLONUS=

could be in trouble fairly quickly. After all, there w=
as something
that stopped them from returning.

The shuttle was flying over=
 what appeared to be an ocean of trees!
They rippled and undulated as the t=
rees covered mountains and valleys.
Small rivers could be seen flowing thro=
ugh it as well, with a huge
river running along the interior of it.

=93The=
re.=94 PROWL said as he pointed to the front view. =93I have located
where =
the dinosaurs possibly came from as they left the woods.=94

What PROWL was=
 indicating was an area where it was obvious that a
tremendous number of cr=
eatures of large must have burst out of the

al devastation of the landscape.

are about to get hot!=94 POLAR CLAW announced. =93Get ready.=94

ed as RAMULUS leaned back in his chair getting ready for

W=
